com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.io.gml

Class GMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.io.gml.GMLWriter

  • public class GMLWriter
extends Object
    GMLWriter writes a Graph to a GML OutputStream.

    GML definition taken from (http://www.fim.uni-passau.de/fileadmin/files/lehrstuhl/brandenburg/projekte/gml/gml-documentation.tar.gz)

    Author:
    Stuart Hendren (http://stuarthendren.net)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GMLWriter

        public GMLWriter(Graph graph)
        Parameters:
        graph - the Graph to pull the data from

    • Method Detail

      • setStrict

        public void setStrict(boolean strict)
        Parameters:
        strict - when set to true, property keys in the graph that do not meet the exact guidelines of the GML specification are ignored. By default this value is false.

      • setNormalize

        public void setNormalize(boolean normalize)
        Parameters:
        normalize - whether to normalize the output. Normalized output is deterministic with respect to the order of elements and properties in the resulting XML document, and is compatible with line diff-based tools such as Git. Note: normalized output is memory-intensive and is not appropriate for very large graphs.

      • setUseId

        public void setUseId(boolean useId)
        Parameters:
        useId - whether to use the blueprints id directly or substitute with a generated integer. To use this option the blueprints ids must all be Integers of String representations of integers

      • setVertexIdKey

        public void setVertexIdKey(String vertexIdKey)
        Parameters:
        vertexIdKey - gml property to use for the blueprints vertex id, defaults to GMLTokens.BLUEPRINTS_ID

      • setEdgeIdKey

        public void setEdgeIdKey(String edgeIdKey)
        Parameters:
        edgeIdKey - gml property to use for the blueprints edges id, defaults to GMLTokens.BLUEPRINTS_ID

      • outputGraph

        public void outputGraph(String filename)
                 throws IOException
        Write the data in a Graph to a GML OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        filename - the GML file to write the Graph data to
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there is an error generating the GML data

      • outputGraph

        public void outputGraph(OutputStream gMLOutputStream)
                 throws IOException
        Write the data in a Graph to a GML OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        gMLOutputStream - the GML OutputStream to write the Graph data to
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there is an error generating the GML data
